alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:45AM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow is expected Wednesday morning which could significantly impact morning commutes. Winds out of the west result in dangerous crosswinds along US 93.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
